meanings: (정신·기운 등을) (의식을 되찾다) regain[recover] consciousness; (분별력을 찾다) come to (one's senses), get back to one's senses...

vlive.korean: 그냥 뭐가 왔을 때 닭볶음탕이면 일단 차릴 거야. Just whenever something comes, I'll set up the braised spicy chicken first. 듣기 View video B1A4 : B1A4 여름 연캉스
vlive.english: Just whenever something comes, I'll set up the braised spicy chicken first.

vlive.korean: 최소 전남친한테 이 정도 예의 차릴 만큼은 성숙해졌다고 나. but I became mature to keep my composure in front of my ex-boyfriend. 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 바람피우고 잠수탄 전남친이 찾아왔다 [한입만] - EP.06
vlive.english: but I became mature to keep my composure in front of my ex-boyfriend.

vlive.korean: [실패하면 정신 바짝 차릴 수 있는] [뭐...] 실패하면 차가운 시원한 생수가 있습니다. If you fail, there will be cold water for you. 듣기 View video Hidden Track No.V : [비투비 예능 훈련소] EP08. 내 마음이 들리니
vlive.english: If you fail, there will be cold water for you.

vlive.korean: 정신차릴 각오가 돼 있습니까! Are you ready to pay attention! 듣기 View video iKON : [KONIC TV] 코니들의 신나는 여름밤
vlive.english: Are you ready to pay attention!

vlive.korean: 여기다 아예 상을 차릴 거죠? Set up our meal here? 듣기 View video V Special : [꽃브로] 꽃미남 브로맨스 - 김지석&박경 EP3. "아이돌 금기"

examples.korean: If she threatens to leave, it should bring him to his senses. 발음듣기 그녀가 떠나겠다고 하면 그가 정신을 차릴 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If she threatens to leave, it should bring him to his senses. 발음

examples.korean: I couldn’t afford more than a broom cupboard to set up office in. 발음듣기 나는 코딱지만한 방에 사무실을 차릴 여유 밖에 안 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I couldn’t afford more than a broom cupboard to set up office in. 발음

examples.korean: Isn't it time for you to behave sensibly now? 발음듣기 이제 너도 속 좀 차릴 때가 되지 않았니? 생활 표현 사전
examples.english: Isn't it time for you to behave sensibly now? 발음

examples.korean: You don't need[have] to be so proper at home. 발음듣기 집에서까지 격식을 차릴 필요는 없다 Neungyule
examples.english: You don't need[have] to be so proper at home. 발음

examples.korean: Just give him time, he'll come around. 발음듣기 그 사람에게 시간을 주면 정신을 차릴거에요. Neungyule
examples.english: Just give him time, he'll come around. 발음
